Python Conan Package
====================

Create
------

- download sources and deps

    python3 download.py

Modify
------

- to add/update python packages (install and) run
    pip3 install -U pip-tools

    on a ubuntu box:
    pip-compile --resolver backtracking --upgrade --output-file=requirements_linux.txt requirements.in --allow-unsafe
    on a windows box:
    pip-compile --resolver backtracking --upgrade --output-file=requirements_windows.txt requirements.in --allow-unsafe

    # download new/changed python wheels
    rm -rf wheels
    python3 download.py

- to build python packages during the package build

  - add the package as described above
  - move the installation of pip from the package() to the build() step
  - add 'wheel' to the install/update of pip and setuptools
  - use 'pip wheel ....' to pre-build the package into the wheel-dir during build()
  - the pre-build wheel will be installed during the package() step

- to update licenses use

    pip-licenses --from=mixed --with-system --format=plain
